summary: U2 is an Irish rock band formed in 1976 in Dublin. The members are Bono (vocals), the Edge (guitar), Adam Clayton (bass), and Larry Mullen Jr. (drums). Their music has evolved from post-punk to a mix of different styles. U2 is known for their powerful live shows and socially aware lyrics. They gained fame in the 1980s with albums like "The Joshua Tree" and have since sold over 150 million records. They've won 22 Grammy Awards and are in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. U2 also supports various social causes.
title: U2
